long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SearXNG is a free, open-source metasearch engine that respects your privacy. It aggregates results from various search engines and provides a high level of customization and privacy for users. This extension lets you use SearXNG instances with customizable settings to find exactly what you need.

Features:
	•	Choose Your Instance: Select from various SearXNG instances or add your own.
	•	Custom Search Engines: Pick your favorite search engine like Google, Bing, DuckDuckGo, and more.
	•	Safe Search Options: Adjust safe search levels to filter your results.
	•	Time Range Filters: Search within specific time frames such as past day, week, month, or year.
	•	Language Preferences: Choose the language for your search results.
	•	Category Filters: Find exactly what you’re looking for in general, images, videos, news, and maps.
	•	Dark Mode: Switch to dark mode for comfortable viewing at night.
	•	Floating Search Bar: Enable a handy floating search bar for quick searches on any webpage.

Disclaimer:
This extension is not an official SearXNG plugin nor is it affiliated with the SearXNG project. Search with SearXNG is perfect for anyone who wants a more private, customizable search experience.
